x264.pipeline: rtspsrc timeout=5 location=__ADDR__ ! rtph264depay ! video/x-h264,width=1280,height=720,framerate=25/1 ! queue ! avdec_h264 ! x264enc key-int-max=60 speed-preset=veryfast tune=zerolatency ! queue ! h264parse ! mp4mux ! filesink location=__FILENAME__

x264.segments.pipeline: rtspsrc timeout=5 location=__ADDR__ ! rtph264depay ! video/x-h264,width=1280,height=720,framerate=25/1 ! queue ! avdec_h264 ! x264enc key-int-max=60 speed-preset=veryfast tune=zerolatency ! queue ! h264parse ! splitmuxsink max-size-time=1000000000 muxer=mp4mux location=%03d-__FILENAME__
